text: 4:2 Onger Akaba 47:8; Aisaia 6:1; Jeremaia 17:12; Akar Mogomem 4:9; 17:3; 21:104:2-3 Esekiel 1:26-28; 10:1Ezɨ Godɨn Duam zuamɨra na gizɨvagha bar pamten nan ingari, ezɨ kɨ garima, Ame! Atrivir dabirabir mam Godɨn Nguibamɨn iti, ezɨ gumazir mam atrivir dabirabir kam gaperaghav iti.4:2 Gumazir Jon garir atrivir dabirabim gaperaghav itim, kar God uabɨ. Egha vezɨn kamɨn Jon guizɨn an ziam dɨbora ghaze, a God. Ezɨ gɨn moghɨra, sapta 7:10ɨn akam kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, God atrivir dabirabim daperav ikiam. Ezɨ God, gumazimɨn mɨn garir puvatɨ. Jon Godɨn angazangarir ekiam ko ziar ekiam biaghirɨgha igharagha otivizibar ganigha, egha dagh isɨn akar isɨn zuimɨn God mɨgei.
